Key.Original: Allow players to step down as leader
Key.English: Allow players to step down as leader

Key.Original: Allows the player step down as a leader using the ACE self-interaction menu.
Key.English: Allows the player step down as a leader using the ACE self-interaction menu.
Key.German: Erlaubt den Spieler den Gruppenführerstatus mit einer ACE-Selbstinteraktion abzugeben.
Key.French: Permet au joueur de renoncer à la position commandante avec une interaction ACE sur soi-même.
